title: Riccitello, Sheehan Step Up as Israel Premier Tech Leaves Froome Behind for Vuelta a España
content:
Riccitello will start as a protected GC rider, and grand tour rookie Sheehan will have freedom to attack: 'I have my eye on a few stages.'

Read the full article at Riccitello, Sheehan Step Up as Israel Premier Tech Leaves Froome Behind for Vuelta a España on Velo.
author: ahood
